about_the_game: The soundtrack for Zen: A Gay Sequel includes the title track Zen, the ZAGS theme, as well as Acoustic versions of both Zen and Yearning, the YAGS theme. Also included is the ZAGS background track Chillin' and a special lewd version of Zen.

content_descriptors.notes: The lewd version of Zen, the ZAGS theme, contains references to explicit gay sex. The other tracks are clean and suitable for all audiences.

detailed_description: The soundtrack for Zen: A Gay Sequel includes the title track Zen, the ZAGS theme, as well as Acoustic versions of both Zen and Yearning, the YAGS theme. Also included is the ZAGS background track Chillin' and a special lewd version of Zen.
name: Zen: A Gay Sequel Soundtrack

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Zen: A Gay Sequel Soundtrack

short_description: The soundtrack for Zen: A Gay Sequel, including acoustic versions of the YAGS theme and ZAGS theme.
